skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...

security_audit.summary: This official skill contains static theme definitions and a PDF showcase. No executable code or network actions are present.

content.user_title: Apply polished themes to your artifacts
content.value_statement: Your decks and documents lack consistent visual style. Theme Factory applies curated palettes and font pairs to create a coherent look.
actual_capabilities: Present a PDF showcase of 10 preset themes for selection
Provide color palettes with hex codes for each theme
Provide header and body font pairings per theme
Provide best use context notes for each theme
Generate a custom theme name and palette from user inputs
Apply a selected theme across an artifact
limitations: Does not edit or update the theme showcase PDF
Does not install or verify font availability on the system
Does not generate slide content, only styling guidance
Custom themes require user review before application

use_cases.title: Brand aligned pitch decks
use_cases.description: Select a preset theme that matches campaign colors and apply it across a sales deck.

use_cases.title: Consistent demo slides
use_cases.description: Use a modern theme with defined typography to keep product demo decks visually consistent.

use_cases.title: Client ready reports
use_cases.description: Apply a professional theme to reports and executive summaries for a polished client delivery.

prompt_templates.title: Show theme options
prompt_templates.scenario: I need to pick a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the theme showcase and list the available theme names.

prompt_templates.title: Apply a preset theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my slide deck and keep contrast high for readability.

prompt_templates.title: Recommend a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Recommend a theme for a healthcare presentation and explain why it fits.

prompt_templates.title: Create a custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme inspired by calm coastal colors and pair it with clean sans serif fonts.

output_examples.input: Apply the Modern Minimalist theme to my report.
output: Palette: Charcoal, Slate Gray, Light Gray, White
Fonts: DejaVu Sans Bold for headers, DejaVu Sans for body text
Guidance: Use light gray for dividers and white for background areas

best_practices: Ask the user to confirm the theme before applying it
Maintain contrast between text and backgrounds for readability
Reuse the same font pairings across all slides
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without user confirmation
Mixing fonts from different themes in one artifact

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides theme guidance that can be used across those platforms.

faq.question: Are there limits on the number of themes?
faq.answer: It includes 10 preset themes and supports creating custom themes.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my slide tool?
faq.answer: Yes, apply the provided colors and fonts in your slide or document tool.

faq.question: Does it collect or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it only provides local theme definitions and guidance.

faq.question: What if a font is not available?
faq.answer: Choose a close system font or install the listed font before applying the theme.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual styling?
faq.answer: It provides consistent palettes and typography faster than manual selection.
